name: SmashCharacterSelector
0:
”Alexa, open smash character selector”
”Alexa, ask smash character selector who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smash character selector
des: Say "Alexa, open Smash Character Selector" and your character will be given to you. Then you just simply pick the character Alexa suggests. This Character Selector has every fighter up to Pyra and Mythra and will continue to be updated until all the Smash Ultimate DLC are released.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
